issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Reduce number of FS permissions and redundant FS operations

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.summary: INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE doesn't clean the table directory before overwriting
